attributes.action: A Homeland Border force to counter the arrival of illegal migrants on UK shores
attributes.additional_details: The current system places significant pressure on border resources and public services, including high accommodation costs. A specialised Homeland Border Force could provide a clearer, more effective response, including the capacity to return people safely using designated vessels, and reduce the long-term financial and operational burden on the UK.
attributes.background: I want the Government to establish a dedicated Homeland Border Force with the resources, authority, and equipment to prevent unauthorised small-boat arrivals, protect UK coastal security, and ensure that immigration laws are effectively enforced

rejection.details: We already have a Border Force: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/border-force
